content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: EXDOSE
      operator: equal_to
      value: 0
    - name: EXLOT
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.134
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: If no test article (as described in EXTRT) is administered (i.e., EXDOSE
  is 0), EXLOT is null.
Outcome:
  Message: EXDOSE is 0, EXLOT may not be populated
  Output Variables:
    - EXDOSE
    - EXLOT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '134'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance:
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 6.1.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - EX

json.Description: If no test article (as described in EXTRT) is administered (i.e., EXDOSE is 0), EXLOT is null.

Outcome.Message: EXDOSE is 0, EXLOT may not be populated
